data.message: I have a woman named Sandy Wolfe that claims to work for Facebook. She told me I had won $500,000 in a drawing for Facebook users & that Facebook would pay that amount IF I send her $145. I'd like to verify this is true or not. I can copy & paste the entire conversation to you if need be.

replies.message: I would have thought FB would be a little concerned at someone trying to run a scam using FB as the employer & saying it's approved by Zuckeerberg....

Hi Robbie, thanks for reaching out. If you've received a message saying that you're a winner of a Facebook lottery or that you've won money from Facebook, we ask that you not respond to it. These messages are part of a scam. Please report the message to us by following these simple steps: http://bit.ly/2cwPqxu. -Brad
I got the same thing different girl but she got scared when I questioned her she erased entire conversation
